description: It has lots of dirt jumps with some ladders.  It has huge gaps.  Not made for novice bikers.
directions: Drive North from Kelowna on Hwy 97 N/Okanagan Hwy to just North of the Kelowna Airport.  Turn right (East) at Old Vernon Road, 1.1 km.  Turn right to stay on Old Vernon Rd 0.2 km.  Turn left at Postill Dr, 1.1 km.   Turn left at Postill Lake Rd, drive 1.5 km.
title: Postil
